namespace.description: The namespace to list repositories from

page.description: The page number to list repositories from

page_size.description: The page size to list repositories from

ordering.description: The ordering of the repositories. Use "-" to reverse the ordering. For example, "last_updated" will order the repositories by last updated in descending order while "-last_updated" will order the repositories by last updated in ascending order.

media_types.description: Comma-delimited list of media types. Only repositories containing one or more artifacts with one of these media types will be returned. Default is empty to get all repositories.

content_types.description: Comma-delimited list of content types. Only repositories containing one or more artifacts with one of these content types will be returned. Default is empty to get all repositories.

full_description.description: The full description of the repository

enabled.description: Whether the repository has immutable tags

rules.description: The rules of the immutable tags

immutable_tags_settings.description: The immutable tags settings of the repository

status_description.description: The status description of the repository

star_count.description: The number of stars the repository has

pull_count.description: The number of pulls the repository has

last_updated.description: The last updated date of the repository

last_modified.description: The last modified date of the repository

date_registered.description: The date the repository was registered

media_types.description: The media types of the repository

content_types.description: The content types of the repository

slug.description: The slug of the category in search engine

storage_size.description: The storage size of the repository

has_starred.description: Whether the user has starred the repository

collaborator_count.description: The number of collaborators on the repository. Only valid when repository_type is 'User'

read.description: if user can read and pull from repository

write.description: if user can update and push to repository

admin.description: if user is an admin of the repository

tools.name: createRepository
tools.description: Create a repository in organisation (namespace) or personal namespace

namespace.description: The namespace of the repository. Required.

name.description: The name of the repository (required). Must contain a combination of alphanumeric characters and may contain the special characters ., _, or -. Letters must be lowercase.

full_description.description: A detailed description of the repository

registry.description: The registry to create the repository in

namespace.description: The namespace of the repository (required). If not provided the `library` namespace will be used for official images.

collaborator_count.description: The number of collaborators on the repository. Only valid when repository_type is 'User'

read.description: if user can read and pull from repository

write.description: if user can update and push to repository

admin.description: if user is an admin of the repository

description.description: The description of the repository. If user asks for updating the description of the repository, this is the field that should be updated.

full_description.description: The full description (overview)of the repository. If user asks for updating the full description or the overview of the repository, this is the field that should be updated.

status.description: The status of the repository. If user asks for updating the status of the repository, this is the field that should be updated. This is a dangerous operation and should be done with caution so user must be prompted to confirm the operation. Valid status are `active` (1) and `inactive` (0). Normally do not update the status if it is not strictly required by the user. It is not possible to change an `inactive` repository to `active` if it has no images.

namespace.description: The namespace of the repository. If not provided the 'library' namespace will be used for official images.

repository.description: The repository to list tags from

page.description: The page number to list tags from

page_size.description: The page size to list tags from

architecture.description: The architecture to list tags from. If not provided, all architectures will be listed.

os.description: The operating system to list tags from. If not provided, all operating systems will be listed.
operating system of the tagged image

os_features.description: features of the operating system of the tagged image

os_version.description: version of the operating system of the tagged image

creator.description: ID of the user that pushed the tag

last_updated.description: The last updated date of the tag

last_updater.description: ID of the last user that updated the tag

last_updater_username.description: Hub username of the user that updated the tag

full_size.description: compressed size (sum of all layers) of the tagged image

tag_status.description: whether a tag has been pushed to or pulled in the past month

media_type.description: media type of this tagged artifact

content_type.description: Content type of a tagged artifact based on it's media type. unrecognized means the media type is unrecognized by Docker Hub.

os.description: operating system of the tagged image

os_features.description: features of the operating system of the tagged image

os_version.description: version of the operating system of the tagged image

last_updated.description: The last updated date of the tag

last_updater.description: ID of the last user that updated the tag

last_updater_username.description: Hub username of the user that updated the tag

full_size.description: compressed size (sum of all layers) of the tagged image

tag_status.description: whether a tag has been pushed to or pulled in the past month

media_type.description: media type of this tagged artifact

content_type.description: Content type of a tagged artifact based on it's media type. unrecognized means the media type is unrecognized by Docker Hub.

tools.name: listNamespaces
tools.description: List organisations (namespaces) the user has access to

page.description: The page number to list repositories from

page_size.description: The page size to list repositories from

orgname.description: The name of the org which is also the namespace name

full_name.description: The full name of the org

profile_url.description: The profile URL of the org

date_joined.description: The date joined of the namespace

gravatar_email.description: The gravatar email of the namespace

gravatar_url.description: The gravatar URL of the namespace

user_role.description: The user role of the namespace

user_groups.description: The user groups of the namespace

org_groups_count.description: The number of org groups of the namespace

plan_name.description: The plan name of the namespace

parent_name.description: The parent name of the namespace

tools.name: listAllNamespacesMemberOf
tools.description: List all organisations (namespaces) the user is a member of including personal namespace

annotations.title: List All Namespaces user is a member of

badges.description: The trusted content to search for

type.description: The type of the repository to search for

categories.description: The categories names to filter search results

architectures.description: The architectures to filter search results

operating_systems.description: The operating systems to filter search results

extension_reviewed.description: Whether to filter search results to only include reviewed extensions

from.description: The number of repositories to skip

size.description: The number of repositories to return

sort.description: The criteria to sort the search results by. If the `sort` field is not set, the best match is used by default. When search extensions, documents are sort alphabetically if none is provided. Do not use it unless user explicitly asks for it.

order.description: The order to sort the search results by

images.description: The images to filter search results

total.description: The total number of repositories found

name.description: The name of the repository in the format of namespace/repository

type.description: The type of the repository. Can be "image", "plugin" or "extension"

created_at.description: The date and time the repository was created

updated_at.description: The date and time the repository was last updated

short_description.description: The short description of the repository

badge.description: The badge of the repository. If the repository is from community publisher, the badge is either 'none' or null.

star_count.description: The number of stars the repository has

pull_count.description: The number of pulls the repository has

name.description: The name of the operating system

label.description: The label of the operating system

large.description: The URL of the large logo

small.description: The URL of the small logo

tools.name: dockerHardenedImages
tools.description: List available Docker Hardened Images in user organisations

organisation.description: The organisation for which the DHIs are listed for. If user does not explicitly ask for a specific organisation, the "listNamespaces" tool should be called first to get the list of organisations the user has access to.
